main event: One object seen with vapor trails moving from North to South to West over Grayville, Illinois on 17 September 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 to 20 minutes., The object was reported to have vapor trails., The flight path of the object was described as moving from N to S to W., There is a sketch depicting the object resembling an apple., The conclusion suggested that the object was possibly an aircraft.
